alert.note: Alert for Coke; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN COKE AND SOUTHERN NOLAN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Silver, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Robert Lee, Blackwell, Hylton, Maryneal, Silver, Sanco, E.V. Spence Reservoir Near Paint Creek Recreation Area, and Oak Creek Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
